meanings.definition: The most basic level of an organization or movement.
meanings.sent1: The grassroots of the club are the regular members who attend meetings.
meanings.sent2: The grassroots of the campaign are the local volunteers who go door-to-door.
meanings.sent3: At the grassroots level, everyone pitches in to make things happen.
meanings.sent4: The grassroots of the tree spread far and wide, providing stability.
meanings.sent5: The grassroots of the project are the foundation on which everything else is built.

meanings.definition: Originating from or supported by the common people.
meanings.sent1: The grassroots movement gained momentum among everyday citizens.
meanings.sent2: The grassroots support for the initiative came from local communities.
meanings.sent3: It was a grassroots effort, with neighbors coming together to help.
meanings.sent4: The idea took root in the grassroots of society and grew strong.
meanings.sent5: The grassroots connection with the community made the project successful.
